findings.title: Deregistration of vendor with pending payment
findings.description: A vendor can be deregistered from an instance of PureMoney2 while there is a pending payment for the vendor preventing the vendor from receiving an outstanding transaction.

findings.title: Unguarded State Variable Assignment: ethPrice
findings.description: Anyone can assign a value to the ethPrice state variable in the Payment2 contract.

findings.title: Unpausable Token
findings.description: The token can be paused or unpaused by the pauser role, but there is no mechanism to prevent this.
